name: staps
title: Stationary periods

fields.name: tag_id
fields.description: Unique identifier of the tag. Foreign key to [`tags.tag_id`](/GeoLocator-DP/core/tags#tag_id).

fields.name: stap_id
fields.description: Identifier of the stationary period to which the twilight belong to.

fields.name: start
fields.description: Date and time of the start of the stationary period. Formatted as an ISO 8601 string with timezone designator `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ`.

fields.name: end
fields.description: Date and time of the end of the stationary period. Formatted as an ISO 8601 string with timezone designator `YYYY-MM-DDThh:mm:ssZ`.

fields.name: known_lat
fields.description: Latitude of the known stationary period. This value is typically assigned by [`GeoPressureR::tag_set_map()`](https://raphaelnussbaumer.com/GeoPressureR/reference/tag_set_map).

fields.name: known_lon
fields.description: Longitude of the known stationary period. This value is typically assigned by [`GeoPressureR::tag_set_map()`](https://raphaelnussbaumer.com/GeoPressureR/reference/tag_set_map).

fields.name: include
fields.description: Boolean value to indicate if the stationary period should be included in the model. This value is typically assigned by [`GeoPressureR::tag_set_map()`](https://raphaelnussbaumer.com/GeoPressureR/reference/tag_set_map).
